description: The CXC vessel company will perform dredging operations
full_summary:
### Competitive Tender Announcement: Maintenance Dredging Services for the Saint-Laurent Seaway

**Event Details**

| **Field Name (English)** | **Field Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS3915526513 |
| Publication Date | May 1, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date and Time | June 30, 2023 at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST) |
| Amendment Number | 0 |
| Sourcing Method | Competitive - Open Bidding |

**Procurement Details**

* **Goods and Services Procured**: Dredging Services
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement,  Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* **Regions of Delivery**: 
    Indeed,             QUEBEC 
* **United Nations Supply Classification (UNSPSC)**: 72141206 (Dredging Services)
* **Procurement Category**: Consumer and Commercial Services

**Contact Information**

* **Name**: Gabriel Fortin-Harvey, Publicly Funded Architect (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: gabriel.fortin-harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL and Attachments**

* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16141943?extsite=MTYxNDE5NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16141943?extsite=MTYxNDE5NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Important Notice

Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard, invites interested companies to participate in the upcoming competitive tender for the maintenance dredging of the Saint-Laurent Seaway.
All questions and comments must be submitted at the latest by June 30, 2023 at 2 PM (EST). All bids submitted after this date will be considered non-responsive. The brief should be consulted to obtain all relevant terms and conditions. Please be advised:
